Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class RoomTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.controller.RoomTimer
  • public class RoomTimer
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to provide the events and methods relative to the timers used by the turn and login handlers

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int elapsed
      Amount of seconds passed since the start of the timer

      Amount of time between every timerTick event

      Duration of the timer

      Event invoked when the timer reaches an end
      private java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor timer  
      IEvent<RoomTimer,​java.lang.Integer> timerTickEvent
      Event invoked every *period* once the timer is started

      Method called when timerTick event is invoked.

    • Method Detail

      • onTimerTick

        private void onTimerTick()
        Method called when timerTick event is invoked. Updates elapsed and checks whether the timeout limit has been reached. If that's the case, the timer is stopped.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Restarts the timer

      • start

        public void start()
        Creates a new timer if there wasn't one running already

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the timer if there was one running already.
